# unlock()

**Type Method**

Relinquishes a previously acquired transaction lock.

## Declaration

```swift
class func unlock()
```

## Discussion

See the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNTransaction/lock()] method for more details on transaction locking.

## Managing Concurrency

- **lock()**: Attempts to acquire a recursive spinlock to ensure the validity of values you retrieve during the transaction.
